description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
number of experiment from publication
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age provided by author
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
study condition presented test or training
whether apes participated in the experimental or control group
order of experiment presented (experiment 1 first e1-e2/ or experiment 2 first e2-e1). Some apes only participated in experiment 2 (e2)

search under correct baited container or under incorrect nonbaited container/ search in a previously baited container (feature)/ previously baited location (place)/ search under the container in the middle (middle)/ no choices (no_choice) and trial not conducted
sum of correct choices during training sessions
whether participants completed exp 1 (floor) or exp 2 (table) first or whether they only participated in exp 2 (table only) or exp 1 (floor only)
percentage of feature searches (asterisks denotes significance in a two-way binomial test)
percentage of place searches (asterisks denotes significance in a two-way binomial test)
author provided notes
